name: Main St
description: Main Street, nearing the western edge of the town square, a place of quiet charm. You are on Main St, nearing the western edge of the town square. The street continues to the east and west, a ribbon of charming commerce. The air is filled with the scent of freshly baked bread from a nearby bakery and the faint, sweet smell of blooming flowers. The storefronts here are all occupied, their windows displaying the latest in fashion and technology.
